definition: belonging to the territory of any state or ruler, a territorial military unit
details:
adjective
- belonging to the territory of any state or ruler
= example: belonging to the territory of any state or ruler
- displaying territoriality
- of or relating to a territory
= example: of or relating to a territory
noun
- a territorial military unit
= synonyms: territorial reserve
- nonprofessional soldier member of a territorial military unit
